channel.title: {abstract:japan}
channel.itunes:summary:
Our dream is to share the Japan you never knew existed.
We break stereotypes through PASSION : KNOWLEDGE : FREEDOM
channel.itunes:author: Tyler Abstract

item.title: Podcast 60
item.dc:creator: abstractjapan
item.description:
Track list:

01 - INFECTION “Crawl (ft. IKEPY)” from THE CRAWL

02 - ANARCHY “Shake Dat Ass (ft. AISHA)” from NEW YANKEE

03 - GIZMO “You” from SPICE OF LIFE

04 - avengers in sci-fi “Symphony Of The End” from jupiter jupiter

05 - Psyche Bugyo “My Abarenbō Shōgun” from Psychedelic Judgeman Comes, He Has the Cherry Blossom on the Shoulder

06 - Marble Sheep “Melted Moon” from Purple

07 - S.M.N. “おどるポンポコリン (「ちびまる子ちゃん」より)” from TOON TUNES -10 Favorite Japanese Anime Songs-

08 - Boris “Aileron” from Attention Please *(12″ Vinyl)

09 - a crowd of rebellion “aquarium” from Calendula

10 - Edge Of Spirit “In Prospect” from SCREAMING FOR THE TRUTH

Background music provided by JINMO - album: Chamber Music For Lab

Notes: Live broadcasts are temporar [...]
item.content:encoded:
Track list:

01 - INFECTION “Crawl (ft. IKEPY)” from THE CRAWL

02 - ANARCHY “Shake Dat Ass (ft. AISHA)” from NEW YANKEE

03 - GIZMO “You” from SPICE OF LIFE

04 - avengers in sci-fi “Symphony Of The End” from jupiter jupiter

05 - Psyche Bugyo “My Abarenbō Shōgun” from Psychedelic Judgeman Comes, He Has the Cherry Blossom on the Shoulder

06 - Marble Sheep “Melted Moon” from Purple

07 - S.M.N. “おどるポンポコリン (「ちびまる子ちゃん」より)” from TOON TUNES -10 Favorite Japanese Anime Songs-

08 - Boris “Aileron” from Attention Please *(12″ Vinyl)

09 - a crowd of rebellion “aquarium” from Calendula

10 - Edge Of Spirit “In Prospect” from SCREAMING FOR THE TRUTH

Background music provided by JINMO - album: Chamber Music For Lab

Notes: Live broadcasts are temporarily on hold while I test out the quality of a completely on-the-go format of recording. I now have the ability to record an episode anytime and anywhere!! -Tyler Abstract.

item.content:encoded:
Track list:

01 - BACK-ON “Departure” from Single

02 - Osamu Ansai “Change Your Mind” from Nightwalk

03 - BLADe “ゆとり” from 悪者～代弁者～

04 - LLLL “Drowned Fish” from Paradice

05 - DJ TECHNORCH “Love Love Love You I Love You (Eye’s by Eyes Remix)” from I WANNA BE A HAPPY

06 - RONDENION’s Ragrange Symphony “Night breeze” from Night breeze

07 - 大塚 愛 “LOVE FANTASTIC” from LOVE FANTASTIC

08 - OOIOO “Atatawa” from Gamel *(2xLP Vinyl)

09 - TSUYOSHI “ノスタルジア” from LOVE

10 - チャラン・ポ・ランタン “スーダラ節” from 忘れかけてた物語

Background music provided by JINMO - album: Exprovisation 01

Notes: We celebrate guest Giggysan’s 30th birthday and talk about a recent OOIOO show! Other big news is that I have upgraded to unlimited host space and bandwidth and also have started JVlogging again with new episodes of J-What?? at https://www.youtube.com/abstractjapan -Tyler Abstract.

Background music provided by JINMO - album: Glossolalia

Notes: There is an easter egg inside this episode with instructions on how to win a prize pack!! Respond quickly because the first person wins!! Also, huge thanks to Giggysan for donating a signed copy of Cibo Matto’s new LP ‘Hotel Valentine’!! -Tyler Abstract.

item.content:encoded:
Track list:

01 - S-VA-HA “Ceremony for anniversary of 3.11 at Fukushima”
02 - Cyclamen “Hope”
03 - Drez “Pray For Japan”
04 - Kat McDowell “3.11″
05 - Sergio Barcala “Tsunami Song”
06 - Amanda Caress “SONG FOR JAPAN, Tsunami: A Day We Wish Didn’t Happen”
07 - Kester Chalkley “Japan Tsunami Flood Relief”

Notes: This episode is dedicated to all the victims, families & friends affected by the 3.11.11 disaster. ♥ -Tyler Abstract

Track list:


01 - NNNNNNNNNN “Les Fleurs du mal” from GRAVITON BERRY JAM

02 - SEX-virgin killer- “To the Last Drop of My Blood” from Crimson Red

04 - ハヌマーン “Fever Believer Feedback” from RE DISTORTION

05 - Shores “Beacons” from Beginning | END

06 - Rhyming Gaijin “Hokkaidōソラン節 So-ran Bushi Remix” from [ ]

07 - ロコビッチ “グロウ” from Demo

08 - You & The Explosion Band “Passart” from Lupin III 3 Original Soundtrack *(12” Vinyl)

09 - ザ・ラジカルズ “オオカミの喰い残し” from NAKED WOLVES, STRAY SHEEPS AND THE RADICALS

10 - 安穂野香 “NICE PEACE” from あらびき団 presents 安穂野香

Background music provided by JINMO - album: Eden.

Notes: Good friend and regular guest Matt stops by again to support the podcast. You can follow him on twitter: @Giggysan. I am honored to announce that from now on all background music during the breaks will be provided by JINMO! You can find more about him at jinmo.com or on twitter: @JINMOxxx. -Tyler Abstract

02 - BAND A “girl’s end” from girl’s end

03 - Dizzy Sunfist “New World” from FIST BUMP

04 - toe “two moons” from CUT_DVD

05 - The Golden Cups “泣かずにいられない” from Blues Message

06 - GALNERYUS “FUTURE NEVER DIES” from PHOENIX RISING

07 - ラディカルズ “Just Shout” from RADICAL DANCE FACTiON

08 - Joe Hisaishi “The Legend of Ashitaka” from Kokyo Kyokushu *(12” Vinyl)

09 - 美空ひばり “リンゴ追分” from Live 1985

10 - machaco “Dreaming” from The Love Directories

Notes: This is the first official live episode! I recorded it while simultaneously broadcasting via Mixlr. I am loving this format because you can listen and chat with me while I am recording the episode! I have been waiting ages to achieve this vibe. More details coming soon. Let’s party together! -Tyler Abstract

item.title: Podcast 42: Acoustic Special!
item.dc:creator: abstractjapan
item.description:
Track list:

01 - 押尾コータロー ”Brand New Wings” from Hand to Hand
item.content:encoded:
Track list:

01 - 押尾コータロー ”Brand New Wings” from Hand to Hand

02 - The Kneesies & The Keys “Rainbow” from TOKYO ACOUSTIC SESSION

03 - Isato Nakagawa “Natsuhiboshi” from Dream Catcher

04 - The Pillows “Tiny Boat” from Acoustic Sessions

05 - Miwa “ヒカリヘ” from ヒカリヘ

06 - Peelander Yellow “Ninja High School” from Live @ Itabashi

07 - Joe “Martin 000-28ec” from Live @ Mully’s Place

08 - かぐや姫 “星降る夜” from Live *(12” Vinyl)

09 - X Japan “Rose of Pain” from Live 94.12.30

10 - Masaki Ito “となりのトトロメドレー” from Live

11 - T-cophony “Meaning of life” from Unknown coloration

12 - Kat McDowell “Treasure” from Hope in you

Notes: Another special episode for you because you are special to me!  -Tyler Abstract

02 - のあのわ “Hurry Up!” from [...]
item.content:encoded:
Track list:

01 - Yuya Uchida & The Flowers ”I’m Dead” from Opera From The Works Of Tadanori Yokoo

02 - のあのわ “Hurry Up!” from Cry Like a Monster

03 - Rebel Familia “Gladiator” from Live @ Kaikoo Popwave Festival 10.04.10

04 - 坂本龍一 “WAR & PEACE (Aoki Takamasa remix)” from Bricolages

05 - Massona “[]” from Live @ 最高音響 11.10.22

06 - ソドム “Tokyo Valentine” from Live

07 - Sunsgrind “Letter to betrayer” from like a grown-up expressions

08 - Joe Hisaishi “虫愛ずる姫” from 風の谷のナウシカ サウンドトラック *(12” Vinyl)

09 - Lullatone “Wake Up Wake Up” from Little Songs About Raindrops

10 - mudy on the 昨晩 “Ozis” from kidnie

Notes: {abstract:japan} is love.  -Tyler Abstract
